resources.string: Set up your Google account to back up and restore your user data, access e-mail, social networks and download new content to your device.
Set up your account to access e-mail, social networks and download new content to your device.

string.dscription: Summary of list for Google account login.

resources.string: Sign in an existing or create a new Google account.

string.name: google_location_msg
string.description: Text for describing Google location setup.

resources.string: "Google\'s Location service uses data from sources such as Wi-Fi networks to help apps determine your approximate location, even when GPS is not available.\n\nYou can change these options anytime in "Settings.

string.name: allow_network_msg
string.description: Message of a check-box for allowing network.

resources.string: "Allow Google\'s Location service to collect anonymous location data. Some data may be stored on your device. Collection may occur even when no apps are running."

string.name: use_location_msg
string.description: Message of a check-box for using location services.

resources.string: Use my location for Google search results and other Google services.

Your device is set up and ready to use.
You can change all items in Settings.

The Setup Wizard can can be rerun from the applications page.

string.description: This message will be shown in AP list if this AP's network notification is disabled.

resources.string: ยินดีต้อนรับ
\"赚+\"大升级 : 玩手机赚Zen币 , 流量包轻松兑 , 畅享吃喝住行
\"短信+\" : 短信APP化 , 自动分类关键信息生成卡片 , 话费充值 , 航班动态 , 火车时刻等服务一键搞定
\"备份+\" : 跨越时间和空间的限制 , 实现桌面布局、应用、联系人等全克隆
\"賺+\"大升級 : 玩手機賺Zen幣 , 流量包輕鬆兌 , 暢享吃喝住行
\"簡訊+\" : 簡訊APP化 , 自動分類關鍵資訊生成卡片 , 話費充值 , 航班動態 , 火車時刻等服務一鍵搞定
\"備份+\" : 跨越時間和空間的限制 , 實現桌面佈局、應用、聯繫人等全克隆
\"Earn+\"great upgrade: Earn Zen coins for mobile data traffic and better entertainment
\"SMS+\": SMS APP, automatic key info classfication to form a SMS card , recharge , flight info , train schedule and other services
\"Backup+\": Back up desktop layout , apps and contacts

resources.string: Please select Inspire ASUS to continue >
Smart Launcher will get access to

To provide you with better service, your information and the device information may be sent to the selected mobile service provider via Wi-Fi or mobile network. The mobile service provider will use the information for the sole purpose of improving the quality of service or providing customized service or technology, and will not disclose the information to the outside world in any form that identifies you personally.
Please select Inspire ASUS to continue and Operator statement >
